name: Class ObjectOutputStream.PutField
text:
Provide programmatic access to the persistent fields to be written
 to ObjectOutput.
codes:
public abstract static class ObjectOutputStream.PutField
extends Object

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         boolean val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named boolean field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         byte val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named byte field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         char val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named char field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         short val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named short field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         int val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named int field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         long val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named long field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         float val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named float field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         double val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named double field into the persistent field.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void put (String name,
                         Object val)
methods.description: Put the value of the named Object field into the persistent field.

Write the data and fields to the specified ObjectOutput stream,
 which must be the same stream that produced this
 PutField object.
